resources.string: \t\t\tThis is a good option for lunch or dinner. It does not use too much cheese, and avocados contain healthy fats and nutrients
\t\t\tYou will only need one ripe tomato, one avocado, sliced bread, butter, mozzarella cheese slices and a sprinkle of salt.
\t\t\tEggs are a good source of protein. Eggs taste good, are protein-filled and really easy to make.
\t\t\tYou will only need a mixing bowl, eggs, goat cheese, salt, fresh-ground black pepper, butter and chopped chives.
\t\t\t Sprucing up your leafy greens with veggies, beans, chickpeas, nuts or seeds, and then drizzling with olive oil and vinegar. You can add a piece of crispy bread to make it more of a meal.
\t\t\t If you eat meat, add chicken or tuna. For extra flavor, consider a sprinkle of salt.
\t\t\tThis is a good option for lunch or dinner.You can add a fried egg on top of anything and make it more of a hearty meal, like on top of salad
\t\t\t You need parsley, garlic cloves, olive oil, red wine vinegar, salt and red pepper flakes. You can also add steak, fish, taco or sandwich dishes.
\t\t\tThe Greek quesadillas are packed with vegetables such as spinach and peppers. It is just a good way to make a satisfying meal that is easy to make.
\t\t\tYou will need tortillas, fresh spinach, red onion, roasted red peppers, black olives, shredded mozzarella cheese, feta cheese crumbles, oregano and/or red pepper flakes.
\t\t\tThis sandwich is made with hummus – and it is vegan-friendly. Combine whatever vegetables you have on hand with hummus on a sandwich. It is delicious and satisfying, and it is good for you.
\t\t\tYou will only need a red onion, one carrot, pea shoots, whole-grain bread and feta cheese crumbles.

It is an application that helps users with various dietary plans. This app will help the users maintain a healthy diet. This will helps users to follow proper diet and keep count on their calorie’s intake. This will help users to lose weight, stay healthy and stronger.

\t\tEating a healthy, balanced diet is one of the most important things you can do to protect your health. It is not about strict limitations, staying unrealistically thin, or depriving yourself of the foods you love. Rather, it’s about feeling great, having more energy, improving your health, and boosting your mood.Healthy lifestyle is gaining popularity day by day in this modern times.
